message: Let's make a deal. This offer benefits us both, but time is of the essence.
Fair is fair. Let's split it evenly.
Bob, my friend, this deal is better than what awaits you next round. Let's be wise and close this.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I won't go lower than this. We both need to be satisfied.
Bob, this is it. My final offer. Take it, or the inflation will eat away even more of your share. It's a fair deal.
